description: This file defines a repository interface for accessing Note entities, extending JpaRepository. It provides a method for searching notes by title or content with case-insensitive partial matches, supporting pagination.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing Note entities.

methods.name: findByTitleContainingIgnoreCaseOrContentContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of notes where the title or content contains the specified keywords, ignoring case.
